verses.verse: כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> its Because שְׁלֹשָׁה֙ <WH7969> For three פִּשְׁעֵ֣י <WH6588> transgressions מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> of Moab וְעַל־ <WH5921> its Because אַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> and for four לֹ֣א <WH3808> I will not אֲשִׁיבֶ֑נּוּ <WH7725> I will not turn away עַל־ <WH5921> its Because שָׂרְפ֛וֹ <WH8313> [the punishment] thereof because he burned עַצְמ֥וֹת <WH6106> the bones מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> of the king אֱד֖וֹם <WH123> of Edom לַשִּֽׂיד׃ <WH7875> into lime

וְשִׁלַּחְתִּי־ <WH7971> But I will send אֵ֣שׁ <WH784> a fire בְּמוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> upon Moab וְאָכְלָ֖ה <WH398> and it shall devour אַרְמְנ֣וֹת <WH759> the palaces הַקְּרִיּ֑וֹת <WH7152> of Kerioth וּמֵ֤ת <WH4191> shall die בְּשָׁאוֹן֙ <WH7588> with tumult מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> and Moab בִּתְרוּעָ֖ה <WH8643> with shouting בְּק֥וֹל <WH6963> [and] with the sound שׁוֹפָֽר׃ <WH7782> of the trumpet

וְהִכְרַתִּ֥י <WH3772> And I will cut off שׁוֹפֵ֖ט <WH8199> the judge מִקִּרְבָּ֑הּ <WH7130> from the midst וְכָל־ <WH3605> all שָׂרֶ֛יהָ <WH8269> all the princes אֶהֱר֥וֹג <WH2026> thereof and will slay עִמּ֖וֹ <WH5973> with אָמַ֥ר <WH559> thereof with him saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD פ

כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God עַל־ <WH5921> its Because שְׁלֹשָׁה֙ <WH7969> For three פִּשְׁעֵ֣י <WH6588> transgressions יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah וְעַל־ <WH5921> its Because אַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> and for four לֹ֣א <WH3808> I will not אֲשִׁיבֶ֑נּוּ <WH7725> I will not turn away עַֽל־ <WH5921> its Because מָאֳסָ֞ם <WH3988> [the punishment] thereof because they have despised אֶת־ <WH853> תּוֹרַ֣ת <WH8451> the law יְהוָ֗ה <WH3069> God וְחֻקָּיו֙ <WH2706> his commandments לֹ֣א <WH3808> not שָׁמָ֔רוּ <WH8104> and have not kept וַיַּתְעוּם֙ <WH8582> caused them to err כִּזְבֵיהֶ֔ם <WH3577> and their lies אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which הָלְכ֥וּ <WH1980> have walked אֲבוֹתָ֖ם <WH1> the which their fathers אַחֲרֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH310> after

וְשִׁלַּ֥חְתִּי <WH7971> But I will send אֵ֖שׁ <WH784> a fire בִּֽיהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> upon Judah וְאָכְלָ֖ה <WH398> and it shall devour אַרְמְנ֥וֹת <WH759> the palaces יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> of Jerusalem פ

כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> its Because שְׁלֹשָׁה֙ <WH7969> For three פִּשְׁעֵ֣י <WH6588> transgressions יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וְעַל־ <WH5921> its Because אַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> and for four לֹ֣א <WH3808> I will not אֲשִׁיבֶ֑נּוּ <WH7725> I will not turn away עַל־ <WH5921> its Because מִכְרָ֤ם <WH4376> [the punishment] thereof because they sold בַּכֶּ֙סֶף֙ <WH3701> for silver צַדִּ֔יק <WH6662> the righteous וְאֶבְי֖וֹן <WH34> and the poor בַּעֲב֥וּר <WH5668> because of נַעֲלָֽיִם׃ <WH5275> for a pair of shoes

הַשֹּׁאֲפִ֤ים <WH7602> That pant עַל־ <WH5921> after עֲפַר־ <WH6083> after the dust אֶ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> of the earth בְּרֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> on the head דַּלִּ֔ים <WH1800> of the poor וְדֶ֥רֶךְ <WH1870> the way עֲנָוִ֖ים <WH6035> of the meek יַטּ֑וּ <WH5186> and turn aside וְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> and a man וְאָבִ֗יו <WH1> and his father יֵֽלְכוּ֙ <WH1980> resort אֶל־ <WH413> to הַֽנַּעֲרָ֔ה <WH5291> in unto the [same] maid לְמַ֥עַן <WH4616> order חַלֵּ֖ל <WH2490> to profane אֶת־ <WH853> שֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> name קָדְשִֽׁי׃ <WH6944> my holy

וְעַל־ <WH5921> on בְּגָדִ֤ים <WH899> upon clothes חֲבֻלִים֙ <WH2254> laid to pledge יַטּ֔וּ <WH5186> And they lay [themselves] down אֵ֖צֶל <WH681> by כָּל־ <WH3605> every מִזְבֵּ֑חַ <WH4196> every altar וְיֵ֤ין <WH3196> the wine עֲנוּשִׁים֙ <WH6064> of the condemned יִשְׁתּ֔וּ <WH8354> and they drink בֵּ֖ית <WH1004> [in] the house אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH430> of their god

וְאָ֨נֹכִ֜י <WH595> I הִשְׁמַ֤דְתִּי <WH8045> Yet destroyed אֶת־ <WH853> הָֽאֱמֹרִי֙ <WH567> I the Amorite מִפְּנֵיהֶ֔ם <WH6440> before אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> them כְּגֹ֤בַהּ <WH1363> them whose height אֲרָזִים֙ <WH730> of the cedars גָּבְה֔וֹ <WH1363> [was] like the height וְחָסֹ֥ן <WH2634> and he [was] strong ה֖וּא <WH1931> he כָּֽאַלּוֹנִ֑ים <WH437> as the oaks וָאַשְׁמִ֤יד <WH8045> yet I destroyed פִּרְיוֹ֙ <WH6529> his fruit מִמַּ֔עַל <WH4605> from above וְשָׁרָשָׁ֖יו <WH8328> and his roots מִתָּֽחַת׃ <WH8478> Thahash

וְאָנֹכִ֛י <WH595> I הֶעֱלֵ֥יתִי <WH5927> Also I brought you up אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> from the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וָאוֹלֵ֨ךְ <WH1980> led אֶתְכֶ֤ם <WH853> בַּמִּדְבָּר֙ <WH4057> through the wilderness אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <WH705> you forty שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> years לָרֶ֖שֶׁת <WH3423> to possess אֶת־ <WH853> אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> the land הָאֱמֹרִֽי׃ <WH567> of the Amorite

וָאָקִ֤ים <WH6965> And I raised up מִבְּנֵיכֶם֙ <WH1121> of your sons לִנְבִיאִ֔ים <WH5030> for prophets וּמִבַּחוּרֵיכֶ֖ם <WH970> and of your young men לִנְזִרִ֑ים <WH5139> for Nazarites הַאַ֥ף <WH637> so אֵֽין־ <WH369> else זֹ֛את <WH2063> O בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> [Is it] not even thus O ye children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Israel נְאֻם־ <WH5002> said יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וַתַּשְׁק֥וּ <WH8248> to drink אֶת־ <WH853> הַנְּזִרִ֖ים <WH5139> But ye gave the Nazarites יָ֑יִן <WH3196> wine וְעַל־ <WH5921> and הַנְּבִיאִים֙ <WH5030> the prophets צִוִּיתֶ֣ם <WH6680> and commanded לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying לֹ֖א <WH3808> not תִּנָּבְאֽוּ׃ <WH5012> Prophesy

הִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> Behold אָנֹכִ֥י <WH595> I מֵעִ֖יק <WH5781> Behold I am pressed תַּחְתֵּיכֶ֑ם <WH8478> beneath כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> after תָּעִיק֙ <WH5781> is pressed הָעֲגָלָ֔ה <WH5699> under you as a cart הַֽמְלֵאָ֥ה <WH4395> fruit לָ֖הּ עָמִֽיר׃ <WH5995> of sheaves

וְאָבַ֤ד <WH6> shall perish מָנוֹס֙ <WH4498> Therefore the flight מִקָּ֔ל <WH7031> from the swift וְחָזָ֖ק <WH2389> and the strong לֹא־ <WH3808> Nor יְאַמֵּ֣ץ <WH553> shall not strengthen כֹּח֑וֹ <WH3581> his force וְגִבּ֖וֹר <WH1368> neither shall the mighty לֹא־ <WH3808> Nor יְמַלֵּ֥ט <WH4422> deliver נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH5315> himself

וְתֹפֵ֤שׂ <WH8610> that handleth הַקֶּ֙שֶׁת֙ <WH7198> the bow לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor יַעֲמֹ֔ד <WH5975> Neither shall he stand וְקַ֥ל <WH7031> and [he that is] swift בְּרַגְלָ֖יו <WH7272> of foot לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor יְמַלֵּ֑ט <WH4422> shall not deliver וְרֹכֵ֣ב <WH7392> [himself] neither shall he that rideth הַסּ֔וּס <WH5483> the horse לֹ֥א <WH3808> Nor יְמַלֵּ֖ט <WH4422> deliver נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH5315> himself

וְאַמִּ֥יץ <WH533> strong לִבּ֖וֹ <WH3820> care for בַּגִּבּוֹרִ֑ים <WH1368> among the mighty עָר֛וֹם <WH6174> naked יָנ֥וּס <WH5127> shall flee away בַּיּוֹם־ <WH3117> in that day הַה֖וּא <WH1931> he נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD פ
